name: AgentManifestoAgent
description: Creates an agent that helps users generate manifestos for new AI agents. This agent guides users through the process of creating manifestos for new agents by: 1. Providing information about the agent framework and structure 2. Asking intent-based questions to understand the user's needs 3. Drafting a manifesto that follows the required format 4. Including appropriate tools based on the agent's purpose. The agent focuses on understanding user intent rather than implementation details, and ensures all manifestos include the four default tools.
